climbs.name: Tropical People
climbs.fa: M. Rangel, J. Garcia et al

content.description: I thought the crux was down low, others, up high.  It's got big holds mostly so it's a fun lead for a moderate leader.
content.location: From Deadbolt, go right 20' to the next buttress.  Rap route w/single 60m.

content.description: Start at overhung dihedral, break right at vertical to roofs. Thin moves above roof to slabby finish. dificult to read onsight.
content.protection: 12bolts, 70m rope or two ropes to get off.
content.location: Just left of Shelley's Whiteout, right of RocDoc.

content.description: starts out 5.9/easy 10 til between the 2nd to last and last bolt where you move sideways right past the intimidating crux.
content.location: West of Finktion wall proper, north of Shock me Silly.

content.description: Start up and left of Fire on the Mtn. Climb the finger crack below the roof to a bolt about 30' above the ground. Follow the roof as it rises diagonally toward the right. Follow the roof to the vertical crack up to the summit tree. sweet sporty moves! rap: fire on the mtn. w/60m rope.
content.location: On the far west part of Finktion Wall/ left of Fire on the Mountain and south of OTDL/Dancing Machine.

climbs.name: Shelley's Whiteout
climbs.fa: M Rangel, J Apprill, Shelley Windsor

content.description: The start is difficult moves thru an overhung dihedral, pro is there but you have to work it.
content.protection: Thin wires to #5 Camalot, mostly thin and one bolt at the start.
content.location: Right of the gully in center of Finktion Wall, about 100yds.  Look for an orange overhung dihedral marking the start.  It is right of Surfing Quartzite.

content.description: The route is steep face til the exit, going out left to get to the anchors it shares with finktion arete was cruxy for me.
content.location: Starts just right of Finktion Arete on the face to the right.

content.description: Start on ledges and stem dihedrals til bolts wander right. Delicate moves right on a thin sharp edge. Then follow big edges to top.
content.location: Between LoFi and Surfing Quartzite.  The former is to the left; the latter to the right.

content.description: Climb out of over hang on to face with thin crack. Match Route G at 1/3 or 1/2 way up, or bust left and meet up with F!
content.location: Left of G, Right of F

content.description: Passing the roof is the toughest move, you can stay under it or move right on easier ground, just stay on the arete for good clean rock.
content.location: On the eastern arete around from Fire on the Mtn; on the western half of finktion wall.  Look for a bolt off a ledge a few feet up.

content.description: Approximately vertical wall (fairly pumpy) follow pockets and crack features up great rock to share anchors w/ Dancing Machine.
content.location: WEST OF FINKTION WALL, NORTH OF SHOCK ME SILLY.

content.description: West face following small corners and roofs, it's steeper than it looks!
content.protection: single set cams, with small nuts.
content.location: "sunset tower" west of Fire on the Mountain Wall. Decend off the back.

content.description: The crux is near the start, the arete is key.  Easy climbing up top after the roof, stay right for full value.
content.protection: 8 bolts; rap hangers shared with OB.
content.location: Start on the ledge just right of Ordinary Bypass, begin on arete.

content.description: Steep thin moves on the right side of pillar/flake to mantel, then slopers!
content.location: Start on large ledge right of the gully.

content.description: strenuous roof past three bolts (crux at second bolt). Then power past slightly overhanging, left facing dihedral. Easier ground above dihedral to anothor bolt up high. rap from chains with 60m rope. Route is 90+ feet
content.location: About 100 feet left of Finktion Arete.

content.description: Bouldery start up a finger crack and shelves to a small hands crack. If you stay in the crack and not use the shelves it's more true to the grade
content.location: Follow the finktion wall around the corner from OB and Tropical People to a slight overhang in an alcove. Rap off of the pine tree or walk off but be careful cause it's loose

content.description: The hard parts are passing the roof and finishing to the anchor.  It crosses a trad line, Shock me Silly, but does not add anything to it, bolt-wise.
content.location: Above the main trail as you drop in the canyon, look for a ledge above about 30' and it is just left of Dos Capitans.

content.description: climb the semi-detached pillar 40ft to it's summit (5.7), clip anchors on main wall. then up the steep clean face to the top (5.8-9).
content.protection: Nuts, single set cams to #3 Camalot.
content.location: On the far LEFT (west) side of Finktion Wall past the gully.

content.description: At the east end of the Finktion wall Look for huge roof. Start near giant prickly pear cactus. Overhung start to 90' of edges and sidepulls, stays on arete mostly. several cruxes, awesome exposure!
Starts on big holds, stays positive thruout.  Crux is up high, kinda spacey but ok cause the holds are so positive.
content.location: Between Shock Me Silly and Fire on the Mountain.  Found on the far left/west end of Finktion Wall.

climbs.name: Deadbolt
climbs.fa: m. rangel, j. garcia, et al

content.description: I thought it was near the start, small steep sections keep it exciting up high.
content.location: From Ordinary Bypass, go right 30', immediately past chimney to buttress/face.

content.description: follow pockets and crack features up a steep wall.
content.location: To the right of nN The Down Low, to the left of Sideways.

content.description: Climb up chimney to the right of Murmur. A bit chossy.
content.protection: Gear + hangers at the top of Murmur/Ordinary Bypass
content.location: Chimney to the right of Murmur

content.description: Very clean rock with steep edges thru a small roof with very clean rock. Sustained insecurity!
content.location: On the large ledge right of the gully.

content.description: It's a fun steep route, start on flakes on the outside corner then stem back right to a small roof above and run for the anchor.
content.location: Route is right of Sideways on upper west part of Finktion Wall.

content.description: South-facing wall above Winter Wall.
